subject: [Radiance-general] Three-phase method: more questions
body:
Gracias German!  :)

So far I've manage to complete the Exercises of the Tutorial, now I'll try
to create my own script using own files, so I'm sure I'll be back here with
more questions...

In the meanwhile: thanks for your help!!  ;)

Chantal.


2013/8/28 Germ?n Molina Larrain <gmolina1 at uc.cl>
